nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会于2017年10月24日选举产生的中国共产党中央委员会，是该党在2017年至2022年间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China on October 24, 2017, serving as the party's highest authority from 2017 to 2022.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
en: 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2017年10月召开的全国代表大会，选举产生了第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in October 2017, which elected the 19th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十九届期间担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中央政治局常委、中央政治局委员等职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, and a member of the Politburo during the 19th term of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构，由中央政治局选举产生。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China, elected by the Political Bureau of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党第十九届中央政治局
en: Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的常设机构，是中国共产党的核心领导机构之一。
description.en: The standing body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and one of the core leadership bodies of the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了中共第十九届中央领导机构及其负责人。
description.en: Elected the central leading bodies and their leaders of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第二次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第二次全体会议
en: Second Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 讨论研究修改宪法部分内容的建议。
description.en: Discussed and studied proposals for amending parts of the Constitution.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任全国人大常委会委员长，在中共十九届二中全会上就修宪建议草案作了说明。
description.en: A Chinese politician, then Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, who explained the draft proposal for constitutional amendments at the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，在中共十九届二中全会后被写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, which was written into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China after the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关，在中共十九届二中全会后被写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: The highest state supervisory body of the People's Republic of China, which was written into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China after the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了关于深化党和国家机构改革的决定和方案。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the decision and plan on deepening the reform of Party and state institutions.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革
en: Deepening Reform of Party and State Institutions

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2018年发起的一项旨在调整党和国家机构职能体系的重大改革。
description.en: A major reform initiated by the Communist Party of China in 2018 aimed at adjusting the functional system of Party and state institutions.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
en: Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions

description.zh-cn: 指导深化党和国家机构改革的具体实施方案。
description.en: The specific implementation plan guiding the deepening reform of Party and state institutions.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第四次全体会议
en: Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了关于坚持和完善中国特色社会主义制度、推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化若干重大问题的决定。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the Decision on Some Major Issues Concerning How to Uphold and Improve the System of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics and Advance the Modernization of China's System and Capacity for Governance.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十九届四中全会上被递补为中央委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was made a full member of the Central Committee at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程技术专家，在中共十九届四中全会上被递补为中央委员。
description.en: A Chinese engineering expert who was made a full member of the Central Committee at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在中共十九届四中全会上被追认留党察看二年的处分。
description.en: A Chinese politician whose punishment of being placed on probation within the Party for two years was confirmed at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议
en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和2035年远景目标的建议》。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Proposals of the CPC Central Committee for Formulating the 14th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development and the Long-Range Objectives Through the Year 2035'.

nodes.id: 中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和2035年远景目标的建议

zh-cn: 中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和2035年远景目标的建议
en: Proposals of the CPC Central Committee for Formulating the 14th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development and the Long-Range Objectives Through the Year 2035

description.zh-cn: 指导中国“十四五”规划和2035年远景目标的纲领性文件。
description.en: A guiding document for China's 14th Five-Year Plan and the long-range objectives through 2035.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第六次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第六次全体会议
en: Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》和《关于召开党的第二十次全国代表大会的决议》。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party over the Past Century' and the 'Resolution on the Convening of the 20th National Congress of the Party'.

nodes.id: 关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议

zh-cn: 关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议
中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议
en: Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party over the Past Century

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党通过的第三个历史决议，总结了党的百年历史。
description.en: The third historical resolution passed by the Communist Party of China, summarizing the party's century-long history.

nodes.id: 关于召开党的第二十次全国代表大会的决议

zh-cn: 关于召开党的第二十次全国代表大会的决议
en: Resolution on the Convening of the 20th National Congress of the Party

description.zh-cn: 决定召开中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会的决议文件。
description.en: The resolution document that decided on the convening of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第七次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第七次全体会议
en: Seventh Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 决定中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会于2022年10月16日在北京召开。
description.en: Decided that the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China would be convened in Beijing on October 16, 2022.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2022年10月召开的全国代表大会，选举产生了第二十届中央委员会。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in October 2022, which elected the 20th Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的工作机关，负责处理中共中央的日常文秘、行政事务和部分党务工作。
description.en: A working body of the CPC Central Committee responsible for handling daily secretarial, administrative, and some party affairs of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的职能部门，主管中共的组织建设、干部队伍建设和人才工作。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee, in charge of the party's organizational building, cadre team building, and talent work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的职能部门，主管意识形态方面的工作。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee, in charge of ideological work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的职能部门，主管统一战线工作。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee, in charge of united front work.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会政法委员会
en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的职能部门，主管政法工作。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee, in charge of political and legal affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会党校

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会党校
en: Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央直属事业单位，负责培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部。
description.en: A public institution directly under the CPC Central Committee, responsible for training high- and mid-level party leaders and Marxist theoretical cadres.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生了中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: The 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China elected the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生，并向其负责。
description.en: The 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was elected by and is responsible to the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届一中全会上当选为中央委员会总书记。

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 担任中共十九届中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第一次全体会议
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了中国共产党第十九届中央政治局委员及常务委员会委员。
description.en: Elected the members and Standing Committee members of the Political Bureau of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第二次全体会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于修改宪法部分内容的建议》，提议将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和国家监察委员会写入宪法。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Proposals of the CPC Central Committee on Amending Parts of the Constitution', proposing to write Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the National Supervisory Commission into the Constitution.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届二中全会上就《中共中央关于修改宪法部分内容的建议（草案）》向全会作了说明。
description.en: Explained the 'Draft Proposals of the CPC Central Committee on Amending Parts of the Constitution' to the plenum at the Second Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第三次全体会议
relationships.target: 深化党和国家机构改革

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于深化党和国家机构改革的决定》和《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，全面启动了该项改革。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions' and the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', officially launching the reform.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 马正武

description.zh-cn: 决定递补中央候补委员马正武为中央委员。
description.en: Decided to elevate Ma Zhengwu, an alternate member of the Central Committee, to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 马伟明 (工程师)

description.zh-cn: 决定递补中央候补委员马伟明为中央委员。
description.en: Decided to elevate Ma Weiming, an alternate member of the Central Committee, to a full member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 刘士余

description.zh-cn: 追认中央政治局作出的给予刘士余留党察看二年的决定。
description.en: Confirmed the decision made by the Political Bureau to place Liu Shiyu on probation within the Party for two years.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议
relationships.target: 中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和2035年远景目标的建议

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和2035年远景目标的建议》。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Proposals of the CPC Central Committee for Formulating the 14th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development and the Long-Range Objectives Through the Year 2035'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第六次全体会议
relationships.target: 关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议

description.zh-cn: 审议通过了《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》。
description.en: Reviewed and adopted the 'Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party over the Past Century'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第七次全体会议
relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 决定中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会于2022年10月16日在北京召开。
description.en: Decided that the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China would be convened in Beijing on October 16, 2022.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的工作机关，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a working body of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的职能部门，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a functional department of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中共中央的职能部门，隶属于中国共产党第十九届中央委员会。
description.en: As a functional department of the CPC Central Committee, it was subordinate to the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央组织部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the Organization Department of the Central Committee during the 19th CPC term.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会党校

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央党校校长。
description.en: Served as President of the Central Party School during the 19th CPC term.

relationships.target: 中共中央政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央政法委书记。
description.en: Served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission during the 19th CPC term.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee during the 19th CPC term.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九届期间担任中央统战部部长。
description.en: Served as Head of the United Front Work Department of the Central Committee during the 19th CPC term.
